thread.title: Snapchat files plans for stock market listing
thread.title_full: Snapchat files plans for stock market listing

title: Snapchat files plans for stock market listing
text:
Snapchat files plans for stock market listing 2   Reuters Snap, the parent company of messaging app Snapchat, has publicly filed plans to list on the US stock market. 
The California-based firm is seeking to raise $3bn (Â£2.4bn) from the share sale, according to reports. 
Based on investments so far, the tech firm would be worth between $20bn and $25bn, making it the biggest US flotation in recent years. 
The company was first reported in November to have filed a confidential application for the listing.
